example.eg: Alex noted Marsha's presence at the poetry reading.
example.egtrans: 阿历克斯注意到，玛莎也出席了诗歌朗读会。

example.eg: The presence of the chair in the middle of the field was rather odd.
example.egtrans: 田野中央出现的那把椅子着实古怪。

example.eg: Robert was a man of stately presence.
example.egtrans: 罗伯特是一个风度翩翩的人。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 风度, 姿态, 仪态

example.eg: Natalie was a real presence; she livened up any event she attended.
Although Wendy could not see anybody in the room, she sensed a presence.

dsense.name: in the presence of [sb], in [sb]'s presence

example.eg: Bill never smoked in the presence of his girlfriend. Tom asked Emily not to use language like that in his presence, as he didn't like it.
example.egtrans: 比尔从不在他女朋友面前抽烟。

example.eg: Your physical presence at the bank won't be necessary because I can sign for you.
There was a strong police presence around the Capital, when the people came to protest.
The presence of fossils in the earth's crust has caused much debate.
In the presence of money, people change.
Firefighters must possess presence of mind when dealing with dangerous situations.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 镇静, 冷静, 冷静
